text: Nikogda, [Mukhammad], ne sovershay molitvy v etoy [mecheti]. Vne vsyakogo somneniya, tebe boleye podobayet sovershat' salat v toy mecheti, kotoraya s pervogo dnya zizhdilas' na nabozhnosti. V etoy mecheti [sovershayut molitvu] muzhi, kotoryye khotyat ochistit'sya ot grekhov. Voistinu, Allakh lyubit ochishchayushchikhsya [ot grekhov]
